title: MathCamp 2024 Student Spring Camp
organization: Ministry of Science and Education of Azerbaijan & 'Bir Könüllü' Student Cooperation Public Union
description: Successfully participated in 'MathCamp 2024,' a student spring camp held in the Guba region. The program, supported by the Ministry of Science and Education, focused on intensive mathematical problem-solving and collaboration among high-achieving students. Gained practical insights into complex mathematical theories and logic through team-based activities and academic seminars.
